channel.title: Npc Battle
channel.description:
Okay. Well i posted this along time ago, but no luck. I had no luck making it myself.
I'm trying to make an NPC battle. Where Fremennick Warriors fight White Knights. But i still have no idea how to make an NPC fight another NPC. So if you have any idea on how this would work please tell me ???
